code:
---
config:
  layout: elk
  theme: base
---
classDiagram
    %% Diagramme de Classe de Conception - Gérer Contenu (Supprimer Annonce/Propriété, Bannir Utilisateur)
    
    class Admin {
        <<entity>>
        -id: Int
        -email: String
        -firstName: String
        -lastName: String
        -userType: UserType
        --
        +deleteAnnouncement(announcementId: Int): Boolean
        +deleteProperty(propertyId: Int): Boolean
        +banUser(userId: Int, reason: String?): User
        +unbanUser(userId: Int): User
        +getAllAnnouncements(): Announcement[]
        +getAllProperties(): Property[]
        +getAllUsers(): User[]
        +moderateContent(): void
    }
    
    class Announcement {
        <<entity>>
        -id: Int
        -authorId: Int
        -content: String
        -createdAt: DateTime
        --
        +delete(): Boolean
        +isModerated(): Boolean
    }
    
    class Property {
        <<entity>>
        -id: Int
        -ownerId: Int
        -title: String
        -isAvailable: Boolean
        -createdAt: DateTime
        --
        +delete(): Boolean
        +isModerated(): Boolean
    }
    
    class User {
        <<entity>>
        -id: Int
        -email: String
        -status: UserStatus
        --
        +ban(reason: String?): void
        +unban(): void
        +isBanned(): Boolean
    }
    
    class UserStatus {
        <<enumeration>>
        PENDING_VERIFICATION
        PENDING_APPROVAL
        ACTIVE
        SUSPENDED
    }
    
    class UserType {
        <<enumeration>>
        ADMIN
    }
    
    %% Relations
    Admin "1" --> "0..*" Announcement : modérer
    Admin "1" --> "0..*" Property : modérer
    Admin "1" --> "0..*" User : bannir
    User "1" --> "1" UserStatus : posséder
    Admin --|> User : hériter
    
    Admin ..> Announcement : supprimer
    Admin ..> Property : supprimer
    Admin ..> User : bannir
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
